title: Hot Girl Summer with Ti Ti Jerry | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 22
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 


 


This episode Chrissy Chaos is kicking off hot girl summer with Ti Ti Jerry! Chris new show on TruTV is coming out July 8th! Make sure you check out Backyard Bar Wars on TruTV. What's your nightmare show to be known for? Chris bombed in front of the Mets owner at a corporate gig. Ti Ti Jerry is over cleaning the Chaos house and pops on the PODDY! Ti Ti talks about freebasing cocaine and how it felt. What's the worst drug you have ever done? Is there air conditioning in prisons? Ti Ti tells us about a time she almost passed out from being too hot in prison. Ti Ti weighs in on Transgender weightlifter in New Zealand’s Olympic team. Shout out Tyra Banks! Ti Ti is coming for America's Next Top Model!! We warn Ti Ti about the dangers of being a model. Ti Ti on Manhattan City Council candidate caught with dominatrix in leaked video. NYC mayor race is heating up! Ti Ti is cleaning houses in the NYC area! We answer a few fan questions. Ti Ti thinks everyone should be single this summer and enjoy a true hot girl summer! What makes Ti Ti mad. Ti Ti spent most her life in prison so we are starting a new series called Ti Ti's bucket list! Coming soon to patreon. Ti Ti puts Chrissy Teigen on BLAST! Ti Ti talks about what it was like to experience 9/11 while being in prison. CHAOS!


 


Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! 


patreon.com/chrisdcomedy 


 


FOLLOW THE CLIPS PAGE!


https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbu7rQDxBYMsuKQeX-x4fEQ/videos


 


CHRISDCOMEDY.COM for all upcoming live comedy show dates 


FOLLOW Chris Distefano On Social Media 


Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/​


Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy​



Follow Chris' podcast with Sal Vulcano called HEY BABE! 


https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​


​


Filmed and Edited by 


THEHOMELESSPIMP https://www.instagram.com/thehomeless...


Twitter - https://twitter.com/homelesspimp?lang=en 


​
